Get disease group details

Source: R/sus_data_filter_cid.R
get_disease_group_details.Rd

Returns detailed information about a specific disease group including ICD codes, description, and climate factors.

Usage

get_disease_group_details(group_name, lang = "en")

Arguments

group_name

Character (e.g, "dengue", "cardiovascular"). Name of the disease group.

lang

Character. Language for output ("en", "pt", "es"). Default "en".

Value

A list with detailed group information.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Get details about dengue in Portuguese
get_disease_group_details("dengue", lang = "pt")

# Get details about cardiovascular diseases in English
get_disease_group_details("cardiovascular", lang = "en")
} # }
